dcterms:creator: John J Godfrey
Edward C Holliman
Jane McDaniel
dcterms:description: The Switchboard corpus contains about 300-hour conversational English telephone speech, used for training automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Switchboard corpus

dcterms:creator: Kikuo Maekawa
dcterms:description: The Corpus of Spontaneous Japanese (CSJ) is one of the largest Japanese spontaneous speech corpora, consisting of about 600-hour spontaneous speech including academic and simulated lectures.
dcterms:title: Corpus of Spontaneous Japanese (CSJ)
